Cards.title: Quick and Easy French Toast
Cards.description: Vanilla extract and cinnamon bring a richness of flavor to French toast. Pick your favorite bread - white, Italian, French or whole wheat. Serve with Maple-Flavored Syrup.

Cards.title: Quick and Easy Beef Stew Recipe
Cards.description: Follow this easy beef stew recipe to learn how to make beef stew in no time! In just 30 minutes, you can have a delicious weeknight meal using McCormickÂ® Beef Stew Seasoning Mix, a tender cut of beef and frozen vegetables.
